plot: Daibazaal chooses a reckless yet highly skilled fighter pilot named Reggar to pilot the latest Mecha Beastman. Reggar is deployed to Altea to go up against Golion and their deadly Four-Lion Attack.
title: "Hyakujû-ô Goraion" Uchû no supiido-kyô
plot_es: Daibazaal chooses a reckless yet highly skilled fighter pilot named Reggar to pilot the latest Mecha Beastman. Reggar is deployed to Altea to go up against Golion and their deadly Four-Lion Attack.
plot_en: Daibazaal chooses a reckless yet highly skilled fighter pilot named Reggar to pilot the latest Mecha Beastman. Reggar is deployed to Altea to go up against Golion and their deadly Four-Lion Attack.
